attributes.action: Immediately reduce the interest rate on Legal Aid in line with the reduction in base rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Interest on Legal Aid bills  is currently at the rate of 8%.

The government should lead by example and reduce its interest rate as it is trying to force the banks to do, instead of attempting to make additional profit from some of the poorer people in the community.

The people paying this interest have a house that is depreciating and could be forced into negative equity by this high rate of interest.

Many are struggling single parents on low incomes with young children who are now facing severe economic problems as a result of the governments hypocrisy over interest rates.

The Legal Services Commission has taken a charge on the property so those affected cannot borrow at the cheaper rates available on the market to repay the loan
